content: For years I have been stuck in a pattern of only consuming non-fiction. My theory is (or has been), if I’m not learning from it, it’s not worth my time. Your article is timely for me…as I’ve been gently encouraged by my therapist to allow my brain to relax a little and read some fiction. I will start with #1. Thanks for this list…you probably have no idea how helpful it is to me.
